summary.span: 提供高性能的 API，以便提供 UTF-8 编码 JSON 文本的只进和非缓存编写权限。

span.span: Provides a high-performance API for forward-only, non-cached writing of UTF-8 encoded JSON text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Utf8JsonWriter` 写入的文本按顺序不使用缓存并默认情况下遵循[JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259)，除了编写注释。`Utf8JsonWriter` writes the text sequentially with no caching and by default adheres to the [JSON RFC](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8259), with the exception of writing comments. 尝试编写无效的 JSON 验证时的方法已启用，则会引发使用特定于上下文的错误消息。A method that attempts to write invalid JSON when validation is enabled throws a with a context-specific error message. 由于此类型是 ref 结构，它不直接支持异步。Since this type is a ref struct, it does not directly support async. 但是，它提供对可重入性编写部分数据，若要继续在区块中编写的支持。However, it does provide support for reentrancy to write partial data and to continue writing in chunks. 若要在格式化输出缩进和空白区域或跳过验证，创建的实例并将其传入到编写器。To be able to format the output with indentation and white space OR to skip validation, create an instance of and pass it in to the writer.

remarks.format: 这对于 IBufferWriter，推进基础根据到目前为止已写入。In the case of IBufferWriter, this advances the underlying based on what has been written so far. 在 Stream 的情况下，这将数据写入到流并将其刷新。In the case of Stream, this writes the data to the stream and flushes it. 实例不能重复使用后释放。The instance cannot be reused after disposing.
